scales: comprehensive modes and scales with equal temperament, just intonation, or quarter comma meantime; active notes are directly editable/playable with dedicated buttons for each channel

scales: equal temperament and just intonation, with some low level micro-tuning capabilities (see documentation)
notes: listen inputs enable the quantizer to keep four oscillators in tune; quad quantizer features are just one alternate mode for this MIDI-to-CV interface
